trigger_description: This trigger fires when the door sensor is closed.
This trigger fires when user  unlocking the lock, his password or fingerprint identification or card  is  confirmed.
This trigger fires when PIR detects person.

trigger: Device or group is turned on
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the specified device/group is turned on.
This trigger fires when the specified camera detects sound. To use this trigger, camera’s sound detection should be turned on.
This trigger fires when water leak detected.

trigger: Device or group is turned off
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the specified device/group is turned off.
This trigger fires when the door sensor is open.
This trigger fires when someone input incorrect password repetitiously.
This trigger fires when the specified camera detects motion. To use this trigger, camera’s motion detection should be turned on.
This trigger fires when water sound and light detected.
This trigger fires when residual electricity in the lock under threshold.
